title: Chicago Heights man charged with threatening violence at Biden inauguration
author: ABC 7 Chicago
description: Federal prosecutors say Louis Capriotti had a yearslong history of threatening federal lawmakers in detailed, profanity-filled voicemails: https://abc7chicago.com/chicago-heights-man-charged-with-threatening-violence-at-bidens-inauguration/9597382/

localize.description: 联邦检察官说，路易斯-卡普里奥蒂有一年的历史，在详细的、充满亵渎的语音邮件中威胁联邦立法者：https://abc7chicago.com/chicago-heights-man-charged-with-threatening-violence-at-bidens-inauguration/9597382/。
localize.title: 芝加哥高地男子被控在拜登就职典礼上威胁使用暴力。
